<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_3"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства_3"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B0%D0%B6%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=31" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>са<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>жи<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>вать</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершенный.html>соверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:осадить.html>осади́ть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>о-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-саж-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ива</b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5_3"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение_3"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B0%D0%B6%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=34" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li>смещать <a href = vnd.unilang:вниз.html>вниз</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:оттягивать.html>оття́гивать</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. ).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:заставлять.html>заставля́ть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:опасть.html>опа́сть</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:осесть.html>осе́сть</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. ).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
</ol>

***осанка.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:осанка.html>оса́нка</a> (16349)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BA%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осанка.html>оса́нка</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">osánka</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осанка.html>оса́нки</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осанка.html>оса́нки</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осанка.html>оса́нок</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>posture, bearing</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BA%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B8%D1%81%D1%82%D1%8B%D0%B9amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="осанистый (page does not exist)">осанистый</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">osanistyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="приосаниваться (page does not exist)">приосаниваться</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">priosanivatʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="приосаниться (page does not exist)">приосаниться</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">priosanitʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BA%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>сан<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ка</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-осан-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:смекалка.html>-к</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***осатанеть.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:осатанеть.html>осатане́ть</a> (27477)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">о-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">o-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">сатанеть</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">satanétʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осатанеть.html>осатане́ть</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">osatanétʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">сатанеть</b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to run wild, to go crazy</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Synonyms">Synonyms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Synonyms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:рассердиться.html>рассерди́ться</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">rasserdítʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:разозлиться.html>разозли́ться</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">razozlítʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:озвереть.html>озвере́ть</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">ozverétʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">остервенеть</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">ostervenétʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B5%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>са<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>та́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>неть</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:совершить.html>совершенный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | сатанеть.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>о-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-сатан-</b>; суффикс: <b>-е</b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

<li><a href = vnd.unilang:рассвирепеть.html>рассвирепе́ть</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ветер.html>ве́тре</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:море.html>мо́ре</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> | т. | п.) <span class="example-fullblock"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:солнце.html>Со́лнце</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; ***осваивать.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:осваивать.html>осва́ивать</a> (10972)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:освоить.html>осво́ить</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">osvóitʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ивать</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ivatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осваивать.html>осва́ивать</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">osváivatʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:освоить.html>осво́ить</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to master, to cope with <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">making knowledge or method into one's "own"</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li>
<li>to settle, to open up, to develop (new territories)</li>
<li>to develop; to become familiar with the use <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">of lands or machines</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li>
<li>to acclimate <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">in terms of plants</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>сва<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>вать</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершенный.html>соверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:освоить.html>осво́ить</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>о-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-сва-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ива</b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:изучать.html>изуча́ть</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:учиться.html>учи́ться</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пользоваться.html>по́льзоваться</a> чем-либо, <a href = vnd.unilang:употреблять.html>употребля́ть</a> что-либо, <a href = vnd.unilang:овладеть.html>овладе́ть</a> чем-либо <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. ).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li> <a href = vnd.unilang:включать.html>включа́ть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:круг.html>круг</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:свое.html>свое́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:хозяйственный.html>хозя́йственной</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:деятельность.html>де́ятельности</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:использовать.html>испо́льзовать</a> выделенные <a href = vnd.unilang:средство.html>сре́дства</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. ).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

***осваиваться.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:осваиваться.html>осва́иваться</a> (28554)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осваивать.html>осва́ивать</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">osváivatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ся</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-sja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осваиваться.html>осва́иваться</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">osváivatʹsja</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:освоиться.html>осво́иться</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to make oneself familiar <i>(with)</i>, to <a href="/w/index.php?title=get_the_feelamp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="get the feel (page does not exist)">get the feel</a> <i>(of)</i></li>
<li>to feel comfortable <i>(with)</i>, to adapt <i>(to)</i>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:осваиваться.html>осва́иваться</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:обстановка.html>обстано́вкой</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>osváivatʹsja</b> s obstanóvkoj</i> ― <span class="e-translation">to (begin to) feel at home; adapt to circumstances</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">passive of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осваивать.html>осва́ивать</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">osváivatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>сва<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>вать<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ся</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,  <a href = vnd.unilang:возвратный.html>возвра́тный</a>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершенный.html>соверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:освоиться.html>осво́иться</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>о-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-сваj-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ива</b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b>; постфикс: <b>-ся</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***осведомитель.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:осведомитель.html>осведоми́тель</a> (13273)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осведомить.html>осве́домить</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">osvédomitʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-тель</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-telʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осведомитель.html>осведоми́тель</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">osvedomítelʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осведомитель.html>осведоми́теля</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осведомитель.html>осведоми́тели</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осведомитель.html>осведоми́телей</a></b>, <i>feminine</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D0%B8%D1%86%D0%B0amp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="осведомительница (page does not exist)">осведомительница</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>informant, informer</li>
<li>whistleblower</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Synonyms">Synonyms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Synonyms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:оса.html>о́с</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ве<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:до.html>до</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ми.html>ми</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>тель</b>

***осведомить.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:осведомить.html>осве́домить</a> (13016)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Perhaps from <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">о-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">o-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">с-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">s-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ведомо.html>ве́домо</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">védomo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ить</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-itʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осведомить.html>осве́домить</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">osvédomitʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">осведомлять</b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to inform</li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:оса.html>о́с</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ве<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:до.html>до</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>мить</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:совершить.html>совершенный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 4a[(3)][(7)].      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | осведомлять.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-осведом-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:соорудить.html>-и</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***осведомиться.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:осведомиться.html>осве́домиться</a> (3847)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осведомить.html>осве́домить</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">osvédomitʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ся</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-sja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осведомиться.html>осве́домиться</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">osvédomitʹsja</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осведомляться.html>осведомля́ться</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to inquire (after, for; about); to want to know (about)</li>
<li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">passive of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осведомить.html>осве́домить</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">osvédomitʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>све<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:до.html>до</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>мить<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ся</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:совершить.html>совершенный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,  <a href = vnd.unilang:возвратный.html>возвра́тный</a>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 4a[③].      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:осведомляться.html>осведомля́ться</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-осведом-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:соорудить.html>-и</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b>; постфикс: <b>-ся</b>. <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>
</p>

<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осведомить.html>осведомлённый</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">osvedomljónnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ость</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ostʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%BB%D1%91%D0%BD%D0%BD%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осведомленность.html>осведомлённость</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">osvedomljónnostʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осведомленность.html>осведомлённости</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осведомленность.html>осведомлённости</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осведомленность.html>осведомлённостей</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>awareness <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">the state or quality of being aware of something</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span></h3>

***осведомляться.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:осведомляться.html>осведомля́ться</a> (20667)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%BB%D1%8F%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">осведомлять</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">osvedomljátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ся</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-sja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%BB%D1%8F%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осведомляться.html>осведомля́ться</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">osvedomljátʹsja</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осведомиться.html>осве́домиться</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to inquire (after, for; about); to want to know (about)</li>
<li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">passive of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">осведомлять</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">osvedomljátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%BB%D1%8F%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:оса.html>о́с</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ве<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:дом.html>дом</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>лять<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ся</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,  <a href = vnd.unilang:возвратный.html>возвра́тный</a>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершенный.html>соверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:осведомиться.html>осве́домиться</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-осведомл-</b>; суффикс: <b>-я</b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b>; постфикс: <b>-ся</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%BB%D1%8F%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

***освежать.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:освежать.html>освежа́ть</a> (16646)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:освежить.html>освежи́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">osvežítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ать</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-átʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:освежать.html>освежа́ть</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">osvežátʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:освежить.html>освежи́ть</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to refresh <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">also one's memory, knowledge, etc.</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li>
<li>to touch up (colors in a painting)</li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:оса.html>о́с</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ве<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:жать.html>жать</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершенный.html>соверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:освежить.html>освежи́ть</a>.

***освежить.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:освежить.html>освежи́ть</a> (17297)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">о-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">o-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:свежий.html>свежий</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">svéžij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ить</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:освежить.html>освежи́ть</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">osvežítʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:освежать.html>освежа́ть</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to refresh <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">also one's memory, knowledge, etc.</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li>
<li>to touch up (colors in a painting)</li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:оса.html>о́с</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ве<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:жить.html>жить</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:совершить.html>совершенный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 4b.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:освежать.html>освежа́ть</a>.

</ol>

***осветитель.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:осветитель.html>освети́тель</a> (22721)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осветить.html>освети́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">osvetítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-тель</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-telʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осветитель.html>освети́тель</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">osvetítelʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr> or <abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осветитель.html>освети́теля</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осветитель.html>освети́тели</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осветитель.html>освети́телей</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">animate</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> illuminator, lighting technician</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">intransitive</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> illuminator <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">device</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>

***осветить.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:осветить.html>освети́ть</a> (2319)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">о-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">o-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:свет.html>свет</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">svet</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ить</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осветить.html>освети́ть</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">osvetítʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:освещать.html>освеща́ть</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to light, to light up, to illuminate</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">figuratively</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to elucidate, to illustrate, to throw light (upon), to shed light on</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:свет.html>свет</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">svet</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:освещение.html>освеще́ние</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">osveščénije</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>све<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>тить</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:совершить.html>совершенный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 4b.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:освещать.html>освеща́ть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>о-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-свет-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:соорудить.html>-и</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:осветиться.html>освети́ться</a> (15800)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осветить.html>освети́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">osvetítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ся</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-sja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осветиться.html>освети́ться</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">osvetítʹsja</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:освещаться.html>освеща́ться</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to light up, to brighten
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:она.html>её</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:лицо.html>лицо́</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:осветиться.html>освети́лось</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:улыбка.html>улы́бкой</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">jejó licó <b>osvetílosʹ</b> ulýbkoj</i> ― <span class="e-translation">a smile lit up her face</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">passive of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осветить.html>освети́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">osvetítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:оса.html>о́с</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ве<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>тить<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ся</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:совершить.html>совершенный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,  <a href = vnd.unilang:возвратный.html>возвра́тный</a>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 4b.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:освещаться.html>освеща́ться</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>о-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-свет-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:соорудить.html>-и</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b>; постфикс: <b>-ся</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

***освещать.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:освещать.html>освеща́ть</a> (5754)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%89%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осветить.html>освети́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">osvetítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ать</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-átʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%89%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:освещать.html>освеща́ть</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">osveščátʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осветить.html>освети́ть</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to light, to light up, to illuminate</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">figuratively</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to elucidate, to illustrate, to throw light (upon), to shed light on</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%89%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:свет.html>свет</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">svet</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:освещение.html>освеще́ние</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">osveščénije</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%89%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>све<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>щать</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершенный.html>соверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:осветить.html>освети́ть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>о-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-свещ-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

***освещаться.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:освещаться.html>освеща́ться</a> (16198)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%89%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:освещать.html>освеща́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">osveščátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ся</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-sja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%89%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:освещаться.html>освеща́ться</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">osveščátʹsja</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:осветиться.html>освети́ться</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to light up, to brighten</li>
<li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">passive of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:освещать.html>освеща́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">osveščátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:оса.html>о́с</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ве<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>щать<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ся</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,  <a href = vnd.unilang:возвратный.html>возвра́тный</a>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершенный.html>соверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:осветиться.html>освети́ться</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>о-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-свещ-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b>; постфикс: <b>-ся</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
